words.translation: Alif Laam Ra|These|(are) the Verses|(of) the Book|and Quran|clear

translations.1: Alif-Laaam-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaabi Wa-Qur-aa-nim Mubeen
translations.2: Aliflamra tilka ayatu alkitabi waquranin mubeenin

words.translation: Perhaps|will wish|those who|disbelieved|if|they had been|Muslims

translations.1: Rubamaa yawaddul lazeena kafaroo law kaanoo muslimeen
translations.2: Rubama yawaddu allatheena kafaroo law kanoo muslimeena

words.translation: Leave them|(to) eat|and enjoy|and diverted them|the hope|then soon|they will come to know

translations.1: Zarhum yaakuloo Wa-yatamatta'oo Wa-yulhihimul amalu fasawfa ya'lamoon
translations.2: Tharhum yakuloo wayatamattaAAoo wayulhihimu alamalu fasawfa yaAAlamoona

words.translation: And not|We destroyed|any|town|but|(there was) for it|a decree|known

translations.1: Wa-maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa Wa-lahaa kitaabum ma'loom
translations.2: Wama ahlakna min qaryatin illa walaha kitabun maAAloomun

words.translation: Not|(can) advance|any|nation|its term|and not|(can) delay it

translations.1: Maa tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahaa Wa-maa yastaakhiroon
translations.2: Ma tasbiqu min ommatin ajalaha wama yastakhiroona

words.translation: And they say|O you|(to) whom|has been sent down|[on him]|the Reminder|indeed you|(are) surely mad

translations.1: Wa-qaaloo yaaa-aiyuhal lazee nuzzila 'alaihiz Zikru innaka lamajnoon
translations.2: Waqaloo ya ayyuha allathee nuzzila AAalayhi alththikru innaka lamajnoonun

words.translation: Why|not|you bring to us|the Angels|if|you are|of|the truthful

translations.1: Law maa taateenaa bil-malaaa'ikati in kunta minas saadiqeen
translations.2: Law ma tateena bialmalaikati in kunta mina alssadiqeena

words.translation: Not|We send down|the Angels|except|with the truth|and not|they would be|then|given respite

translations.1: Maa nunazzilul malaaa'i-kata illaa bilhaqqi Wa-maa kaanooo izam munzareen
translations.2: Ma nunazzilu almalaikata illa bialhaqqi wama kanoo ithan munthareena

words.translation: Indeed We|We|have sent down|the Reminder|and indeed We|of it|(are) surely Guardians

translations.1: Innaa Nahnu nazalnaz Zikra Wa-Innaa lahoo lahaa-fizoon
translations.2: Inna nahnu nazzalna alththikra wainna lahu lahafithoona

words.translation: And certainly|We (had) sent|before you|before you|in|the sects|(of) the former (people)

translations.1: Wa-laqad arsalnaa min qablika fee shiya'il awwaleen
translations.2: Walaqad arsalna min qablika fee shiyaAAi alawwaleena

words.translation: And not|came to them|any|Messenger|but|they did|at him|mock

translations.1: Wa-maa yaateehim mir Rasoolin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
translations.2: Wama yateehim min rasoolin illa kanoo bihi yastahzioona

words.translation: Thus|We let it enter|in|(the) hearts|(of) the criminals

translations.1: kazaalika naslukuhoo fee quloobil mujrimeen
translations.2: Kathalika naslukuhu fee quloobi almujrimeena

words.translation: Not|they believe|in it|and verily|have passed|the way(s)|(of) the former (people)

translations.1: Laa yu'minoona bihee Wa-qad khalat sunnatul awwaleen
translations.2: La yuminoona bihi waqad khalat sunnatu alawwaleena

words.translation: And (even) if|We opened|to them|a gate|from|the heaven|and they were to continue|therein|(to) ascend

translations.1: Wa-law fatahnaa 'alaihim baabam minas samaaa'i fazaloo feehi ya'rujoon
translations.2: Walaw fatahna AAalayhim baban mina alssamai fathalloo feehi yaAArujoona

words.translation: They would surely say|Only|have been dazzled|our eyes|Nay|we|(are) a people|bewitched

translations.1: Laqaaloo innamaa sukkirat absaarunaa bal nahnu qawmum mashooroon
translations.2: Laqaloo innama sukkirat absaruna bal nahnu qawmun mashooroona

words.translation: And verily|We have placed|in|the heavens|constellations|and We have beautified it|for the observers

translations.1: Wa-laqad ja'alnaa fis samaaa'i buroojanw Wa-zaiyannaahaa linnaazireen
translations.2: Walaqad jaAAalna fee alssamai buroojan wazayyannaha lilnnathireena

words.translation: And We have protected it|from|every|devil|accursed

translations.1: Wa-hafiznaahaa min kulli Shaitaanir rajeem
translations.2: Wahafithnaha min kulli shaytanin rajeemin

words.translation: Except|(one) who|steals|the hearing|then follows him|a burning flame|clear

translations.1: Illaa manis taraqas sam'a fa-atba'ahoo shihaabum mubeen
translations.2: Illa mani istaraqa alssamAAa faatbaAAahu shihabun mubeenun

words.translation: And the earth|We have spread it|and [We] cast|therein|firm mountains|and [We] caused to grow|therein|of|every|thing|well-balanced

translations.2: Waalarda madadnaha waalqayna feeha rawasiya waanbatna feeha min kulli shayin mawzoonin

words.translation: And We have made|for you|therein|means of living|and whom|you are not|for him|providers

translations.1: Wa-ja'alnaa lakum feehaa ma'aayisha Wa-mal lastum lahoo biraaziqeen
translations.2: WajaAAalna lakum feeha maAAayisha waman lastum lahu biraziqeena

words.translation: And not|(is) any|thing|but|with Us|(are) its treasures|and not|We send it down|except|in a measure|known

translations.1: Wa-im min shai'in illaa 'indanaa khazaaa-'inuhoo Wa-maa nunazziluhooo illaa biqadarim ma'loom
translations.2: Wain min shayin illa AAindana khazainuhu wama nunazziluhu illa biqadarin maAAloomin

words.translation: And We have sent|the winds|fertilizing|and We sent down|from|the sky|water|and We gave it to you to drink|And not|you|of it|(are) retainers

translations.1: Wa-arsalnar riyaaha la-waaqiha fa-anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa-asqai-naakumoohu Wa-maaa antum lahoo bikhaazineen

translations.1: Wa-innnaa la-nahnu nuhyee Wa-numeetu Wa-nahnul waarisoon
translations.2: Wainna lanahnu nuhyee wanumeetu wanahnu alwarithoona

words.translation: And verily|We know|the preceding ones|among you|and verily|We know|the later ones

translations.1: Wa-la-qad 'alimnal mustaqdimeena minkum Wa-laqad 'alimnal mustaakhireen
translations.2: Walaqad AAalimna almustaqdimeena minkum walaqad AAalimna almustakhireena

words.translation: And indeed|your Lord|He|will gather them|Indeed He|(is) All-Wise|All-Knowing

translations.1: Wa-inna Rabbaka Huwa yahshuruhum; innahoo Hakeemun 'Aleem
translations.2: Wainna rabbaka huwa yahshuruhum innahu hakeemun AAaleemun

translations.2: Walaqad khalaqna alinsana min salsalin min hamain masnoonin

words.translation: And the jinn|We created it|before|before|from|fire|scorching

translations.1: Waljaaanna khalaqnaahu min qablu min naaris samoom
translations.2: Waaljanna khalaqnahu min qablu min nari alssamoomi

words.translation: And when|your Lord said|your Lord said|to the Angels|Indeed, I|(will) create|a human being|(out) of|clay|from|black mud|altered

translations.1: Wa-iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa'-ikati innee khaaliqum basharam min salsaalim min hama-im masnoon
translations.2: Waith qala rabbuka lilmalaikati innee khaliqun basharan min salsalin min hamain masnoonin

words.translation: So when|I have fashioned him|and [I] breathed|into him|of|My spirit|then fall down|to him|prostrating

translations.1: Fa-izaa sawwaituhoo Wa-nafakhtu feehi mir roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen
translations.2: Faitha sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu feehi min roohee faqaAAoo lahu sajideena

words.translation: So prostrated|the Angels|all of them|together

translations.1: Fasajadal malaaa'ikatu kulluhum ajma'oon
translations.2: Fasajada almalaikatu kulluhum ajmaAAoona

words.translation: Except|Iblis|He refused|to|be|with|those who prostrated

translations.1: Illaaa ibleesa abaaa ai yakoona ma'as saajideen
translations.2: Illa ibleesa aba an yakoona maAAa alssajideena

words.translation: He said|O Iblis!|What|(is) for you|that not|you are|with|those who prostrated

translations.2: Qala ya ibleesu ma laka alla takoona maAAa alssajideena

words.translation: He said|I am not|I am not|(one) to prostrate|to a human|whom You created|(out) of|clay|from|black mud|altered

translations.1: Qaala lam akul li-asjuda libasharin khalaqtahoo min salsaalim min hama-im masnoon
translations.2: Qala lam akun liasjuda libasharin khalaqtahu min salsalin min hamain masnoonin

words.translation: He said|Then get out|of it|for indeed you|(are) expelled

translations.1: Qaala fakhruj minhaa fa-innaka rajeem
translations.2: Qala faokhruj minha fainnaka rajeemun

words.translation: And indeed|upon you|(will be) the curse|till|(the) Day|(of) [the] Judgment

translations.1: Wa-inna 'alaikal la'nata ilaa Yawmid Deen
translations.2: Wainna AAalayka allaAAnata ila yawmi alddeeni

words.translation: He said|O my Lord!|Then give me respite|till|(the) Day|they are raised

translations.1: Qaala Rabbi fa-anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
translations.2: Qala rabbi faanthirnee ila yawmi yubAAathoona

words.translation: He said|Then indeed you|(are) of|the ones given respite

translations.1: Qaala fa-innaka minal munzareen
translations.2: Qala fainnaka mina almunthareena

words.translation: Till|the Day|(of) the time|well-known

translations.1: Ilaa Yawmil waqtil ma'loom
translations.2: Ila yawmi alwaqti almaAAloomi

words.translation: He said|My Lord!|Because|You misled me|surely I will make (evil) fair-seeming|to them|in|the earth|and I will mislead them|all

translations.1: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa aghwaitanee la-uzayyin-anna lahum fil ardi Wa-la-ughwiyan-nahum ajma'een
translations.2: Qala rabbi bima aghwaytanee laozayyinanna lahum fee alardi walaoghwiyannahum ajmaAAeena

words.translation: Except|Your slaves|among them|the ones who are sincere

translations.1: Illaa 'ibaadaka minhumul mukhlaseen
translations.2: Illa AAibadaka minhumu almukhlaseena

words.translation: He said|This|(is) the way|to Me|straight

translations.1: Qaala haaza Siraatun 'alaiya Mustaqeem
translations.2: Qala hatha siratun AAalayya mustaqeemun

words.translation: Indeed|My slaves|not|you have|over them|any authority|except|those who|follow you|of|the ones who go astray

translations.1: Inna 'ibaadee laisa laka 'alaihim sultaanun illaa manit taba'aka minal ghaaween
translations.2: Inna AAibadee laysa laka AAalayhim sultanun illa mani ittabaAAaka mina alghaweena

words.translation: And indeed|Hell|(is) surely the promised place for them|all

translations.1: Wa-inna jahannama lamaw'iduhum ajma'een
translations.2: Wainna jahannama lamawAAiduhum ajmaAAeena

words.translation: For it|(are) seven|gates|for each|gate|among them|(is) a portion|assigned

translations.1: Lahaa sab'atu abwaab; likulli baabim minhum juz'um maqsoom
translations.2: Laha sabAAatu abwabin likulli babin minhum juzon maqsoomun

words.translation: Indeed|the righteous|(will be) in|Gardens|and water springs

translations.1: Innal muttaqeena fee Jannaatinw Wa-'uyoon
translations.2: Inna almuttaqeena fee jannatin waAAuyoonin

words.translation: Enter it|in peace|secure

translations.1: Udkhuloohaa bisalaamin aamineen
translations.2: Odkhulooha bisalamin amineena

words.translation: And We (will) remove|what|(is) in|their breasts|of|rancor|(they will be) brothers|on|thrones|facing each other

translations.1: Wa-naza'naa ma fee sudoorihim min ghillin ikhwaanan 'alaa sururim mutaqaabileen
translations.2: WanazaAAna ma fee sudoorihim min ghillin ikhwanan AAala sururin mutaqabileena

words.translation: Not|will touch them|therein|fatigue|and not|they|from it|will be removed

translations.2: La yamassuhum feeha nasabun wama hum minha bimukhrajeena

words.translation: Inform|My slaves|that I|I am|the Oft-Forgiving|the Most Merciful

translations.1: Nabbi' 'ibaadeee annneee an al-Ghafoorur Raheem
translations.2: Nabbi AAibadee annee ana alghafooru alrraheemu

words.translation: And that|My punishment|it|(is) the punishment|the most painful

translations.1: Wa-anna 'azaabee huwal 'azaabul aleem
translations.2: Wa anna AAathabee huwa alAAathabu alaleemu

words.translation: And inform them|about|(the) guests|(of) Ibrahim

translations.1: Wa-nabbi'hum 'an daifi Ibraaheem
translations.2: Wanabbihum AAan dayfi ibraheema

words.translation: When|they entered|upon him|and said|Peace|He said|Indeed we|(are) of you|afraid

translations.1: Iz dakhaloo 'alaihi faqaaloo salaaman qaala innaa minkum wajiloon
translations.2: Ith dakhaloo AAalayhi faqaloo salaman qala inna minkum wajiloona

words.translation: They said|(Do) not|be afraid|indeed we|[we] bring glad tidings to you|of a boy|learned

translations.1: Qaaloo la tawjal innaa nubashshiruka bighulaamin 'aleem
translations.2: Qaloo la tawjal inna nubashshiruka bighulamin AAaleemin

words.translation: He said|Do you give me glad tidings|Do you give me glad tidings|although|has overtaken me|old age|Then about what|you give glad tidings

translations.1: Qaala abashshartumoonee 'alaaa am massaniyal kibaru fabima tubashshiroon
translations.2: Qala abashshartumoonee AAala an massaniya alkibaru fabima tubashshirooni

words.translation: They said|We give you glad tidings|in truth|so (do) not|be|of|the despairing

translations.1: Qaaloo bashsharnaaka bilhaqqi falaa takum minal qaaniteen
translations.2: Qaloo bashsharnaka bialhaqqi fala takun mina alqaniteena

words.translation: He said|And who|despairs|of|(the) Mercy|(of) his Lord|except|those who are astray

translations.1: Qaala Wa-mai yaqnatu mir rahmati Rabbiheee illad daaaloon
translations.2: Qala waman yaqnatu min rahmati rabbihi illa alddalloona

words.translation: He said|Then what|(is) your business|O messengers|O messengers

translations.1: Qaala famaa khatbukum aiyuhal mursaloon
translations.2: Qala fama khatbukum ayyuha almursaloona

words.translation: They said|Indeed we|[we] have been sent|to|a people|criminals

translations.1: Qaaloo innaaa ursilnaaa ilaa qawmim mujrimeen
translations.2: Qaloo inna orsilna ila qawmin mujrimeena

words.translation: Except|the family|of Lut|indeed we|surely will save them|all

translations.1: Illaaa Aala Loot; innaa lamunajjoohum ajma'een
translations.2: Illa ala lootin inna lamunajjoohum ajmaAAeena

words.translation: Except|his wife|We have decreed|that she|(is) surely of|those who remain behind

translations.1: Illam ra-atahoo qaddarnaaa innahaa laminal ghaabireen
translations.2: Illa imraatahu qaddarna innaha lamina alghabireena

words.translation: And when|came|(to the) family|(of) Lut|the messengers

translations.1: Falamma jaaa'a Aala Lootinil mursaloon
translations.2: Falamma jaa ala lootin almursaloona

words.translation: He said|Indeed you|(are) a people|unknown

translations.1: Qaala innakum qawmum munkaroon
translations.2: Qala innakum qawmun munkaroona

words.translation: They said|Nay|we have come to you|with what|they were|in it|disputing

translations.1: Qaaloo bal ji'naaka bimaa kaanoo feehi yamtaroon
translations.2: Qaloo bal jinaka bima kanoo feehi yamtaroona

words.translation: And we have come to you|with the truth|and indeed we|surely (are) truthful

translations.1: Wa-atainaaka bilhaqqi Wa-innaa lasaadiqoon
translations.2: Waataynaka bialhaqqi wainna lasadiqoona

words.translation: So travel|with your family|in a portion|of|the night|and follow|their backs|and not|let look back|among you|anyone|and go on|where|you are ordered

translations.1: Fa-asri bi-ahlika biqit'im minal laili wattabi' adbaarahum Wa-laa yaltafit minkum ahadunw wamdoo haisu tu'maroon
translations.2: Faasri biahlika biqitAAin mina allayli waittabiAA adbarahum wala yaltafit minkum ahadun waimdoo haythu tumaroona

words.translation: And We conveyed|to him|[that]|the matter|that|(the) root|(of) these|would be cut off|(by) early morning

translations.1: Wa-qadainaaa ilaihi zaalikal amra anna daabira haaa'ulaaa'i maqtoo'um musbiheen
translations.2: Waqadayna ilayhi thalika alamra anna dabira haolai maqtooAAun musbiheena

words.translation: And came|(the) people|(of) the city|rejoicing

translations.1: Wa-jaaa'a ahlul madeenati yastabshiroon
translations.2: Wajaa ahlu almadeenati yastabshiroona

words.translation: He said|Indeed|these|(are) my guests|so (do) not|shame me

translations.1: Qaala inna haaa'ulaaa'i daifee falaa tafdahoon
translations.2: Qala inna haolai dayfee fala tafdahooni

words.translation: And fear|Allah|and (do) not|disgrace me

translations.1: Wattaqul laaha Wa-laa tukhzoon
translations.2: Waittaqoo Allaha wala tukhzooni

words.translation: They said|Did not|we forbid you|from|the world

translations.1: Qaalooo awalam nanhaka 'anil 'aalameen
translations.2: Qaloo awalam nanhaka AAani alAAalameena

words.translation: He said|These|(are) my daughters|if|you would be|doers

translations.1: Qaala haaa'ulaaa'i banaateee in kuntum faa'ileen
translations.2: Qala haolai banatee in kuntum faAAileena

words.translation: By your life|indeed they|were in|their intoxication|wandering blindly

translations.1: La'amruka innahum lafee sakratihim ya'mahoon
translations.2: LaAAamruka innahum lafee sakratihim yaAAmahoona

words.translation: So seized them|the awful cry|at sunrise

translations.1: Fa-akhazat-humus saihatu mushriqeen
translations.2: Faakhathathumu alssayhatu mushriqeena

words.translation: And We made|its highest (part)|its lowest|and We rained|upon them|stones|of|baked clay

translations.1: Faja'alnaa 'aaliyahaa saafilahaa Wa-amtamaa 'alaihim hijaaratam min sijjeel
translations.2: FajaAAalna AAaliyaha safilaha waamtarna AAalayhim hijaratan min sijjeelin

words.translation: Indeed|in|that|(are) the Signs|for those who discern

translations.1: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayaatil lilmutawassimeen
translations.2: Inna fee thalika laayatin lilmutawassimeena

words.translation: And indeed it|(is) on a road|established

translations.1: Wa-innahaa labi-sabeelim muqeem
translations.2: Wainnaha labisabeelin muqeemin

words.translation: Indeed|in|that|surely (is) a Sign|for the believers

translations.1: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayatal lilmu'mineen
translations.2: Inna fee thalika laayatan lilmumineena

words.translation: And were|And were|(the) companions|(of) the wood|surely wrongdoers

translations.1: Wa-in kaana Ashaabul Aikati lazaalimeen
translations.2: Wain kana ashabu alaykati lathalimeena

words.translation: So We took retribution|from them|and indeed they both|(were) on a highway|clear

translations.1: Fantaqamnaa minhum Wa-innahumaa labi-imaamim mubeen
translations.2: Faintaqamna minhum wainnahuma labiimamin mubeenin

words.translation: And certainly|denied|(the) companions|(of) the Rocky Tract|the Messengers

translations.2: Walaqad kaththaba ashabu alhijri almursaleena

words.translation: And We gave them|Our Signs|but they were|from them|turning away

translations.1: Wa-aatainaahum Aayaatinaa fakaanoo 'anhaa mu'rideen
translations.2: Waataynahum ayatina fakanoo AAanha muAArideena

words.translation: And they used (to)|carve|from|the mountains|houses|secure

translations.1: Wa-kaanoo yanhitoona minal jibaali buyootan aamineen
translations.2: Wakanoo yanhitoona mina aljibali buyootan amineena

words.translation: But seized them|the awful cry|(at) early morning

translations.1: Fa-akhazat-humus saihatu musbiheen
translations.2: Faakhathathumu alssayhatu musbiheena

words.translation: And not|availed|them|what|they used (to)|earn

translations.1: Famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon
translations.2: Fama aghna AAanhum ma kanoo yaksiboona

words.translation: And not|We created|the heavens|and the earth|and whatever|(is) between them|except|in truth|And indeed|the Hour|(is) surely coming|So overlook|(with) forgiveness|gracious

translations.1: Wa-maa khalaqnas samaawaati wal-arda Wa-maa bainahumaaa illaa bilhaqq; Wa-innas Saa'ata la-aatiyatun fasfahis safhal jameel

words.translation: Indeed|your Lord|He|(is) the Creator|the All-Knower

translations.1: Inna Rabbaka Huwal khallaaqul 'aleem
translations.2: Inna rabbaka huwa alkhallaqu alAAaleemu

words.translation: And certainly|We have given you|seven|of|the oft-repeated|and the Quran|Great

translations.1: Wa-laqad aatainaaka sab'am minal masaanee wal-Qur-aanal 'Azeem
translations.2: Walaqad ataynaka sabAAan mina almathanee waalqurana alAAatheema

words.translation: (Do) not|extend|your eyes|towards|what|We have bestowed|with it|(to) categories|of them|and (do) not|grieve|over them|And lower|your wing|to the believers

translations.1: Laa tamuddanna 'ainaika ilaa maa matta-'naa biheee azwaajam minhum Wa-laa tahzan 'alaihim wakhfid janaahaka lilmu-'mineen
translations.2: La tamuddanna AAaynayka ila ma mattaAAna bihi azwajan minhum wala tahzan AAalayhim waikhfid janahaka lilmumineena

translations.1: Wa-qul inneee anan nazeerul mubeen
translations.2: Waqul innee ana alnnatheeru almubeenu

words.translation: As|We sent down|on|those who divided

translations.1: Kamaaa anzalnaa 'alal muqtasimeen
translations.2: Kama anzalna AAala almuqtasimeena

words.translation: Those who|have made|the Quran|(in) parts

translations.1: Allazeena ja'alul Quraana 'i-deen
translations.2: Allatheena jaAAaloo alqurana AAideena

words.translation: So by your Lord|surely We will question them|all

translations.1: Fawa-Rabbika lanas'a-lannahum ajma'een
translations.2: Fawarabbika lanasalannahum ajmaAAeena

words.translation: About what|they used (to)|do

translations.1: Ammaa kaanoo ya'maloon
translations.2: AAamma kanoo yaAAmaloona

words.translation: So proclaim|of what|you are ordered|and turn away|from|the polytheists

translations.1: Fasda' bimaa tu'maru Wa-a'rid anil mushrikeen
translations.2: FaisdaAA bima tumaru waaAArid AAani almushrikeena

words.translation: Indeed We|[We] are sufficient for you|(against) the mockers

translations.1: Innaa kafainaakal mustahzi'een
translations.2: Inna kafaynaka almustahzieena

words.translation: Those who|set up|with|Allah|god|another|But soon|they will come to know

translations.1: Allazeena yaj'aloona ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; fasawfa ya'lamoon
translations.2: Allatheena yajAAaloona maAAa Allahi ilahan akhara fasawfa yaAAlamoona

words.translation: And verily|We know|that [you]|(is) straitened|your breast|by what|they say

translations.1: Wa-laqad na'lamu annaka yadeequ sadruka bimaa yaqooloon
translations.2: Walaqad naAAlamu annaka yadeequ sadruka bima yaqooloona

words.translation: So glorify|with the praise|(of) your Lord|and be|of|those who prostrate

translations.1: Fasbbih bihamdi Rabbika Wa-kum minas saajideen
translations.2: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wakun mina alssajideena

words.translation: And worship|your Lord|until|comes to you|the certainty

translations.1: Wa'bud Rabbaka hattaa yaatiyakal yaqeen
translations.2: WaoAAbud rabbaka hatta yatiyaka alyaqeenu
